participant_1.background:
I remember when nobody had a television.
I love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.
I am 100 years old.
I feel like i might live forever.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy exploring new parts of the city.
I volunteer at the homeless shelter.
I am a piano teacher on the side.
My father played violin professionally.
I play several instruments.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
What do you do for fun?
I enjoy exploring new parts of the city, volunteering at the homeless shelter, and teaching piano on the side.
That sounds fun! I love to explore new places too. I've been all over the world, but there's always something new to see.
I agree! I love learning about new cultures and meeting new people.
What's your favorite thing about volunteering at the homeless shelter?
I love being able to help people who are in need. It's a great feeling to know that you're making a difference in someone's life.
That's really nice of you. I'm sure the people you help appreciate it.
They do! I've gotten a lot of positive feedback from the people I've helped. It's really rewarding to see the difference you can make in someone's life.
I'm glad you're able to do something so meaningful with your time.
Me too! I feel lucky to be able to help others.
What instruments do you play?
I play the piano, guitar, and ukulele.
Wow! That's impressive! I can only play the piano.
It's never too late to learn another instrument!
I know, but I'm not very good at it.
You'll get better with practice!
I'm sure you're right.
I'm always happy to give lessons if you're interested.
I might take you up on that offer.
Great! Let me know when you're ready.
